items.title: Custom Web Development
items.text: I build responsive, high-performance websites and web applications tailored to your business needs, using modern frameworks, clean and maintainable code and low-code platforms

items.title: Internal Tools & Systems
items.text: I build internal web tools and dashboards that support day-to-day operations, improve data accuracy, and help teams work more efficiently.

items.title: Automate Workflows
items.text: I automate repetitive tasks and workflows using tools like Airtable, Make, and system integrations to reduce manual work and improve operational efficiency.

items.title: Product & Process Support
items.text: I help teams plan, execute, and improve their workflows by supporting sprint cycles, refining processes, and translating requirements into practical technical solutions.
